sentences.sContent: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.sCn: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.sContent: ...and then use the wealth created to tackle environmental degradation...
...Development agencies disagree regarding how to tackle environment issues while ensuring economic progress...
...Politicians may tackle polluters while scientists do battle with carbon emissions...
...Those that wish to tackle tradition and make American campus more cost-conscious may find it easier to take Trachtenberg’s advice: open campuses year-round...
...To tackle the problem of graduation gap...
...To tackle the problem of aging populations at its root...

words.tran: 做抓和揪动作的人；阻截队员；抱住并摔倒对方抱球队员者

trans.tranOther: to try to deal with a difficult problem
the equipment used in some sports and activities, especially fishing
